title: Hollywood Girls
overview: Ayem Stevens and Caroline Vales are best friends. After a violent argument with her mother, Ayem realised that there was nothing for her in France and she decided to start a new life in California with Caroline, a woman recently separated from her fiancé who cheated on her the night before their wedding. In Los Angeles, they will find love, friendship and unexpected betrayal, with their lives changing for the better and for the worse.
